topic.title: Cellar Hot Legs
topic.shortdesc: The Cellars Hot Legs are an absolute must-try and one of the best bang-for-your-buck apps in Blacksburg! These were the first food discovery I made as a freshman at Virginia Tech, and they've remained a personal favorite throughout the years.

image.alt: Image of the inside of the cellar restaurant.

body.p: The hot legs come with 10 hot chicken legs with a big side of ranch or blue cheese. They also come with carrots and celery and you will definitely have leftovers! The restaurant operates on a seat-yourself system, which means you'll want to get there early to grab a table!
